website_summaries.verdict: Custom water temperature settings provide the base to espresso perfection.
pros: With high-end design aesthetics, this coffee machine not only instantly upgrades the room it's in, but enhances the experience as well
Ideal for those who drink coffee and/or espresso a few times a day
Enhances the taste of several coffee and espresso beans as well
cons: We would love a larger water tank

customer_reviews.title: A Good investment for coffee lovers! ( latte and cappuccino)
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this product, the only problem is that you have to warm up the milk prior to use or the coffee would be cold. I wish the water bucket was a little bigger, even though, you can make 3 cups of coffee each time you fill it up. It’s a nice/compact design, easy to clean, easy to use, and makes a great taste coffee. It’s good for a small household use, I don’t recommend it for an office 5 + people.
customer_reviews.author: farnaz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We set it on strongest coffee setting, still week. We used a Jura before and was awesome but this model we were not pleased with. We tried different settings, just couldn't get the coffee to our liking
customer_reviews.author: Rachaell stasiak

customer_reviews.title: Weak, watery coffee.
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry to say that I had high hopes for a machine that makes the most tasteless, watery espresso I’ve ever had. I’ve gone through all the possible settings, tried multiple roasts of coffee from some of the top roasters in the Bay Area. Nothing. This machine produces weak coffee. Period. Not nearly as great as an older Jura I had previously. Not sure what happened to Jura, but can not recommend this machine at all.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews for this device and new this was exactly what I needed for our office. After trying the coffee we found it was even better than originally expected. Our neighbor was in the market for one and after trying one cup she said “this is the flavor I was looking for every morning!”. She just bought one :) The only negative, which is not bad, is that you have to empty the drip tray more than expected because the machine cleans itself periodically throughout the day if it’s left on and will spray a little water in the tray each time. A must have! Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: SampsonM

customer_reviews.title: The froth doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The froth doesn't work well at all, it produces hot milk. not sure if a defect or that's how it works but considering the cost, i shouldn't have to go thru the trouble of finding out.
customer_reviews.author: Nononsense

customer_reviews.title: Coffee machine.
customer_reviews.text: Love my coffee maker. The taste is super. No kureg for us. Real coffee n espresso. Easy to use n clean Please read n keep the instruction book for programming and making speciality coffees.
customer_reviews.author: Sunipatch

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This JURA makes a great cup of coffee. More flavorful than regular coffee maker, and uses less beans in the process. Cleanup and maintenance same or less than our drip coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: best coffee maker for home use
customer_reviews.text: takes little room and makes amazing coffees. 95% maintenance free only 4 stars due to small water tank and price
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes great coffee. Has small water tank. Coffee could be stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE MACHINE!
customer_reviews.text: This Jura ENA Micro 90 delivers the very best coffee and espresso we have ever made at home. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Consistent great coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. It does require daily maintenance. Perfect for those who are not into burning their mouth with boiling hot water (and really don’t understand the need for such high temperature). The milk foam is not as great as the coffee flavor.
customer_reviews.author: A Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Good at this price
customer_reviews.text: Not such expensive but it's a good time for me to enjoy this
customer_reviews.author: chiehli

customer_reviews.title: Exellent!!
customer_reviews.text: This small machine can prepare very nice rich-flavored espresso. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: risa y

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My only wish is that the water reservoir was larger
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Lupariello

customer_reviews.title: Jura Micro makes great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Very capable coffee and expresso maker for household with low number of daily users as the name implies this is a small size appliance so frequent touches to fill water well, empty spent grounds and fill bean grinder are necessary. The grinding and brewing process in the machine are excellent but some experimentation with beans may be needed to find your favorite taste. Did not purchase the milk cannister.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Nettleton

customer_reviews.title: I’m already a user of the Jura brand. Top ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m already a user of the Jura brand. Top brand in home coffee machines. Unfortunately the voltage is 110v 60hz. For usage in the US primarily. And it was know that it’s shipping to a country where the voltage is 220v 50hz. What a deception.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, or less
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to replace 10 year old Jura which worked perfectly until it died of old age. This new Jura 15116 micro 10 is no comparison. It takes time to learn the simplest adjustments, once set it only brews on type of adjustment; the flavor is weak even at highest setting and the coffee is warm at best, not hot. Would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: TMG

customer_reviews.title: Can’t have my coffee any other way! Fresh roasted ...
customer_reviews.text: Can’t have my coffee any other way! Fresh roasted coffee beans via any Jura machine is the way to start my morning every time!!
customer_reviews.author: jeanette mcginnis

customer_reviews.title: We like it so far.
customer_reviews.text: There are cheaper coffee machines out there but we like this Juro machine and we like the coffee it makes.
customer_reviews.author: I say what I think.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic machine
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best home espresso machine I have ever used. Definitely worth the higher price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine - makes great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Great machine - makes great coffee. Swiss did it right.
customer_reviews.author: eyeonquality

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, we love it and use it every day, twice a day. No more Starbucks.
customer_reviews.author: Berta

customer_reviews.title: Small machine great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Best $1000 I ever spent. The footprint of the machine is small yet the quality of the espresso and cappuccino is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Meir

customer_reviews.title: Love Jura Machines
customer_reviews.text: Love Jura Machines. This one is small enough for our boat and performs as well as our full sized Jura at home.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Redwanc

customer_reviews.title: It's a leaker / floor washer.
customer_reviews.text: Did not buy the machine but through the PX. Machine shipped directly from JURA. Right out of the chute it does not even get past the setup cycle. Does not pump with filter in place. Barely dribbles water out the dispensers with no filter installed. The best feature is the countertop and floor washer built in. It will pump the whole tank out of the machine onto the counter and on to the floor. "All machines pretested" BS! Called the 800 number, put on hold, then told to leave a message. I'm done; it's going back for a full refund and just like that I'm one & done with Jura.
customer_reviews.author: M-14 Guy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this machine!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried quite a few different coffee machines through the years, and this is BY FAR my favorite! It’s super easy to clean, easy to use and makes the most delicious expressos, lattes and cappuccinos!
customer_reviews.author: HappyandHealthyOlivia

customer_reviews.title: ... coffee machine is designed not only to make the perfect espresso, but also to be as small as ...
customer_reviews.text: The ultra-compact 1-cup coffee machine is designed not only to make the perfect espresso, but also to be as small as possible.
customer_reviews.author: asher sarig

customer_reviews.title: High maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Make great coffee. If you are planning to make milk based drinks stay away from it. You have a complicated cleaning process which take at least 5 minutes every time you make a coffee. It also has a 37 oz water tank. Be ready to fill it after every other drink.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Smith

product_meta.title: Jura 15116 ENA Micro 90 Espresso Machine, Micro Silver
product_meta.description: The compact one-touch machine from Jura can prepare the full range of specialties, from Latte macchiato, cappuccino and milk foam to coffee, espresso or hot water - at the touch of a button. And with its energy-saving mode It also offers outstanding energy efficiency.
feature_bullets: ONE TOUCH: Prepare 6 barista quality specialties including espresso, coffee, cappuccino and latte macchiato at the touch of a button
PERFECT ESPRESSO: Ultimate coffee quality thanks to JURA's exclusive Pulse Extraction Process
CONICAL BURR GRINDER: Fast and precise AromaG3 grinder grinds whole beans to the optimum fineness
ECO FRIENDLY: JURA is always freshly ground, not capsuled - fresh taste with very limited waste - single serve machine
CAPACITY: 37 ounce water tank, 4.4 ounce bean container

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars69 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
